a_card_id_here.description: A short description to remember what this card is about
a_card_id_here.type: media|mode|action. The card functionality. The available options are: 'media' to play a media file, 'mode' to set a specific mode for multiple media files per card, 'action' if a card has specific code to run like a shutdown

data.default: The default value to read if no other setting is found.
